data.title: Leaders In AI Summit 2024
data.meta_description: Discover insights on AI innovation from Allan McLennan, a seasoned industry expert. Explore his expertise at the Leaders in AI Summit.
data.text: Allan brings to the table over three decades of proven and evolved leadership across global Media & Entertainment digital IP entertainment, AI development applications and data analytics e.g. as the current President of 2G Digital Post; Founder of a leading technology global consulting/analyst group; President Data leader (NASDAQ : RENT); Intl Head of M&E â 110k employee global SI (Atos); EVP Television platform technology; co-creator of one of the first global streaming services and co-producer of an Emmy subnmitted television series. Allanâs work has placed him in fortune 500 where he has provided extensive M&E technology executive intelligence & global network gained through deploying offerings on 5 continents and in 17 countries providing services to over a billion households and devices through technology providers, studios, broadcasters & advertisers worldwide (ie; Ericsson, Microsoft, Siemens, Rentrak, Spielberg, APPLE, COMCAST, Deluxe, Dreamworks, BBC, SKY, ProSiebensat, Globecast, Disney. Rai etal), and currently works with studios such as SONY, Disney, Pluto, UNBC and more. He holds an MBA International Strategy (team/behavioral economics); global speaker on media ecology; a guest lecturer at Stanford Graduate School of Business; co-author as his book Authority rose to the position of #4 on the WSJ Best sellers list; co-creator of five foundational patents for targeted advertising/personalization and he is a contributing member of industry leading organization SMPTE, ATAS & PGA and on the BODâs of IET (London) & CEI (NYC).
